Day1.AboutIt: This talk will cover the basics of machine learning, including supervised and unsupervised learning, decision trees, and linear regression.
Learn about deep learning and how to use TensorFlow to build neural networks for image classification, language translation, and more.
Discover the basics of data visualization and how to use the D3.js library to create interactive visualizations for the web.
Learn how to build RESTful APIs using the Flask web framework and how to connect them to databases and other services.

Day2.AboutIt: This talk will cover advanced techniques in machine learning, including neural networks, deep reinforcement learning, and generative models.
Learn how to use the Natural Language Toolkit (NLTK) to perform tasks such as text classification, part-of-speech tagging, and sentiment analysis.

Day2.Talk: Building Mobile Apps with React Native
Day2.AboutIt: Discover how to build mobile apps for iOS and Android using React Native and how to integrate them with APIs and backends.

Day2.Talk: Web Scraping with BeautifulSoup and Selenium
Day2.AboutIt: Learn how to extract data from websites using the BeautifulSoup and Selenium libraries and how to clean and manipulate the data for analysis.
